resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104459</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104459</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring Probability</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschende Wahrscheinlichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Probabilité L'explorant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Probabilidade Explorando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Probabilità D'Esplorazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ερευνήσει την πιθανότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Probabilidad Que explora</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an activity that shows that probabilities of getting head/head, head/tail, and tail/tail when you throw 2 coins at the same time 30 times.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Aktivität, die dieses 
Wahrscheinlichkeiten des Erhaltens von von head/head, head/tail und 
tail/tail zeigt, wenn Sie 2 Münzen gleichzeitig 30mal werfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité qui montre ce des 
probabilités d'obtenir head/head, head/tail, et tail/tail quand vous 
jetez 2 pièces de monnaie en même temps 30 fois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade que mostrem esse 
probabilidades de começar head/head, head/tail, e tail/tail quando 
você joga 2 moedas ao mesmo tempo 30 vezes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività che mostra quel le 
probabilità di ottenere head/head, head/tail e tail/tail quando 
gettate 2 monete allo stesso tempo 30 volte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα που δείχνει ότι οι 
πιθανότητες να πάρουν επικεφαλής/διευθύνουν, 
διευθύνουν/παρακολουθούν, και ουρά/ουρά όταν ρίχνετε 2 
νομίσματα συγχρόνως 30 φορές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una actividad que muestra ese 
probabilidades de conseguir head/head, head/tail, y tail/tail cuando 
usted lanza 2 monedas en el mismo tiempo 30 veces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
FN:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104459</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/exploring-probability</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
